name: 东方百问-TouHouAsked
description:
This game is a quiz game with the theme of the Oriental project. Based on the ordinary answering games that have been seen everywhere in the past, this game has made a new form suitable for the needs of the oriental fans.
In this game, all the question banks are divided into setting categories, games, music, secondary and human, and many more detailed classifications, providing ample choice for fans in different fields.
Moreover, the game also supports the player to participate in the construction of the question bank, and share the knowledge you know through the topic to more people. However, in order to ensure the quality and reasonable structure of the question bank, the audit team of the production team may have a fairly rigorous review of the questions you submitted, please understand.
Note: This game is a Q&A and communication platform for lovers of Oriental projects. Therefore, it is not suitable for ordinary players who are not fans of the East. Of course, if you are interested in the Oriental project, but still lack sufficient understanding, in this kind of game. In this case, this game may be a way for you to gradually understand the Eastern project, and you are welcome to come and play, we will try our best to provide you with a better gaming experience. About making This game system originated from the China Chengdu Oriental ONLY live Q&A activity that began in 2011 and continues to this day. The production team is a fan group designed to participate in the event.

The game mode and game title database are still in the process of being perfected. Now it is open to all Oriental lovers, and also provides technical support for related Oriental activities.

Production: Root Nine Studio
Original: 上海アリス幻乐団/ ZUN
This game complies with the Oriental Project Steam release specification
